text: Blade is a 1998 American vampire superhero horror movie starring Wesley Snipes. It was followed by Blade II and Blade: Trinity. == Other websites == * Category:1998 horror movies Category:1990s superhero movies Category:African- American superhero movies Category:1990s American action movies Category:American science fiction horror movies Category:Blade movies Category:1990s English-language movies Category:Film noir Category:Movies about revenge Category:Movies based on comics Category:New Line Cinema movies Category:Superhero horror movies Category:Vampires in movies Category:American superhero movies Category:1998 science fiction movies Category:Movies composed by Mark Isham
title: Blade (movie)
